reviews.review_msg: Professor Bogle is AMAZING. He is everything you want in a professor: kind, caring, and an absolute genius. He gives great feedback and is always available for extra help.

Dr. Bogle is an awesome prof, they are hilarious and kind, and connect with all their students. Class is graded difficulty, but will definitely help you learn and improve your writing, he gives great feedback too. Material is so interesting I honestly wish I could take the class all over again, highly reccomend.
Professor Bogle is great! Approachable and very helpful. He gives great feedback on papers, and is easily accessible outside of class for extra help. I would LOVE to take another class with him!
